name: Lil' Justin's Fame Escape
description:
Be sure to download the Windows version for maximum performance/comfort (but the WebGL version is fine too!)

You’re Justin Famous - an up-and-coming teen pop idol - and you need to get to your next gig in time… but the town is swarming with fans that will try and to anything to make that perfect selfie with you, even if it means that you won’t make it in time.

Avoid fans’ gaze, try to lose them by diving into crowds, throw them a pile of autographs to distract them as last resort, and make sure you’re not late to the concert!

Controls: WSAD / arrows / left stick - movement Space / A - throw autographs

Created in 72h by: Arek Duch, Paweł Laskowski, Konrad Piechota, Kamila Rusiecka, Luke Spierewka

Additional credits: Lato font family (http://www.latofonts.com/), https://freesound.org/people/TheGertz/sounds/235911/, https://freesound.org/people/TheGertz/sounds/235911/
